def Load(widget):
if widget.Entity == None : return
podeAlterarDeletar = widget.Entity.PodeExcluirEditar()
widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterarDeletar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterarDeletar widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not widget.Entity.EhItemConsumoDeProducao()
